segments.text: R :: Good morning . Room Reservations . May I help you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I ’ d like to reserve a room .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: R :: Thank you , sir . For which date and how many guests will there be in your party ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: From April 16th to 20th . Just my wife and myself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: R :: From April 16th to 20th.And which kind of room would you prefer , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Could you hold the line please ? I ’ ll check our room availability . ( After a while ) Thank you for waiting , sir . We have a twin room at US $ 180 per night , will that be all right ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , sir . May I have your name and phone number , please ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure . May name is Aaron Johnson , and my phone number is 3242-5827 .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: R :: Mr . Aaron Johnson , phone number is 3242-5827 . Excuse me , how do you spell your first name ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It ’ s double A , R , O , N .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Double A , R , O , N . Thank you , Mr . Johnson . May I know your arrival time on April 16th ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mr . Johnson , for the unguaranteed reservation , we can only hold the room by 6 p . m . , because it is the peak season now . If you make a guaranteed reservation , we can hold the room overnight . Would you like to make a guaranteed reservation by credit card ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Fine . Do you accept American Express ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . May I know the number ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you , Mr . Johnson . You ’ Ve made a guaranteed reservation at the Guangzhou xx Hotel , from April 16th to 20th for 5 nights . If you can ’ t arrive as schedule , please inform us before 6 p . m . on April . hank you for calling and we look forward to serving you
segments.speaker: S1
